name: GuARRd the Rum
description:
Description

GuARRd the Rum is a pirate-brawler at sea. Swashbuckle against three other scallywags, each trying to secure the rum for victory. Knock other players off with a punch or drag them into the sea. Hold on for your life, gripping objects nearby and avoid capsizing!

Team

William Goddard, Layton Hawkes, Steve Last, Ben Marrinan, Michael Szewczyk.

Contact & Support

http://wgoddard.com/
